appointmentForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your basketball goals, previous training experience, or any questions...

appointmentSuccess.seoDescription: Thank you for your application. We will be in touch soon.
appointmentSuccess.heading: Application **Submitted!**
appointmentSuccess.thankYou: Thank you for your interest in M4 Basketball Training. We have received your application and will review it shortly.
appointmentSuccess.nextSteps: Coach Marcelinho or a member of our team will contact you within 24-48 hours to discuss the next steps.

pricing.paymentDescription: We accept Zelle and Cash payments only. Monthly payment is due before the first session of each month.

contact.signUpDescription: To sign up for training, please contact Marcelo directly via phone or email. He will get back to you with more information about availability, scheduling, and next steps.
contact.noteText: Marcelo personally responds to all inquiries. Please allow 24-48 hours for a response.

metadata.title: Marcelinho Machado Basketball Training | Elite Basketball Coaching
metadata.description: Elite basketball training in Orlando from Olympic athlete Marcelinho Machado. Limited spots for serious youth players ages 11-16. Focus on basketball IQ, skills, and mental development.
